title: Bachelor of Science in Criminal Justice
description: With the Bachelor of Science in Criminal Justice degree at Kennesaw State, you'll develop a deep understanding of the criminal justice system as an institution at the core of societal concerns. As a criminal justice major, you'll not only have a better understanding of the problem; you'll learn to become a part of the solution.
careers: Lawyer, Forensic Accountant, Loss Prevention, Data Analysis
school: Department of Sociology and Criminal Justice
